# problem.Problem { #optyx.problem.Problem }

```python
problem.Problem(name=None)
```

An optimization problem with objective and constraints.

## Example {.doc-section .doc-section-example}

>>> x = Variable("x", lb=0)
>>> y = Variable("y", lb=0)
>>> prob = Problem()
>>> prob.minimize(x**2 + y**2)
>>> prob.subject_to(x + y >= 1)
>>> solution = prob.solve()
>>> print(solution.values)  # {'x': 0.5, 'y': 0.5}

## Note {.doc-section .doc-section-note}

The Problem class is not thread-safe. Compiled callables are cached
per instance and reused across multiple solve() calls for performance.
Any mutation (adding constraints, changing objective) invalidates the cache.

### solve { #optyx.problem.Problem.solve }

```python
problem.Problem.solve(method='auto', strict=False, **kwargs)
```

Solve the optimization problem.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Default   |
|----------|----------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| method   | [str](`str`)   | Solver method. Options: - "auto" (default): Automatically select the best method:     - Linear problems → linprog (HiGHS)     - Unconstrained, n ≤ 3 → Nelder-Mead     - Unconstrained, n > 1000 → L-BFGS-B     - Unconstrained, else → BFGS     - Bounds only → L-BFGS-B     - Equality constraints → trust-constr     - Inequality only → SLSQP - "linprog": Force LP solver (scipy.optimize.linprog) - "SLSQP": Sequential Least Squares Programming - "trust-constr": Trust-region constrained optimization - "L-BFGS-B": Limited-memory BFGS with bounds - "BFGS": Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno - "Nelder-Mead": Derivative-free simplex method | `'auto'`  |
| strict   | [bool](`bool`) | If True, raise ValueError when the problem contains features that the solver cannot handle exactly (e.g., integer/binary variables with SciPy). If False (default), emit a warning and use the best available approximation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `False`   |
| **kwargs |                | Additional arguments passed to the solver.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `{}`      |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                  | Description                   |
|--------|---------------------------------------|-------------------------------|
|        | [Solution](`optyx.solution.Solution`) | Solution object with results. |

#### Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type                       | Description                                                                                    |
|--------|----------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | [ValueError](`ValueError`) | If no objective has been set, or if strict=True and the problem contains unsupported features. |
